Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class Room

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Room
public class Room extends Object
Represents a hotel room with various attributes such as room number, price, type, capacity, etc. It also allows for managing guest reservations and calculating the room price for the stay based on the number of days.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(int number, int price, String type, int capacity)
      Constructs a new Room object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      number - the room number
      price - the price per night for the room
      type - the type of the room (e.g., single, double, suite)
      capacity - the maximum number of guests the room can accommodate

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the room's guest list, booking dates, and additional information. This can be used to reset the room after a guest checks out.

    • isFree

      public boolean isFree()
      Checks if the room is free (i.e., if there are no guests currently booked).
      Returns:
      true if the room is free, false otherwise

    • calculatePrice

      public long calculatePrice()
      Calculates the price of the room based on the number of days the room has been booked. If the room has been booked in the past, it calculates the price based on the start date. If the room is free, it calculates the price for the current date.
      Returns:
      the calculated price of the room

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the room with its number, price, type, and capacity.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the room
